Comments_List: I developed new patience for seeing a large project all the way through and understand of what I see as unique aspects of my compositional voice.
All strengths - it is great that senior are allowed free reign compositionally to put together ambitious projects and my advising has been great.
Of course all music majors should do senior composition projects!
